description: This file defines a repository interface for managing 'Match' entities in a MongoDB database, utilizing Spring Data MongoDB. It extends MongoRepository to leverage built-in CRUD operations and includes a custom query method to find matches by user ID.

classes.name: MatchRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data MongoDB repository interface for 'Match' objects with custom query method to find matches by user ID.

methods.name: findByUserId
methods.description: Retrieves a list of 'Match' objects associated with the specified user ID.
